data.text: Isi na vose vili mumo vake Mndewa Imulungu,
Kwavija heyo keka chandusilo chake uchanha ya bahali,
Nani yonda yakwele kulugongo lwa Mndewa Imulungu?
Imunhu yeli na makono mazelu na moyo mzelu,
Munhu ayo kobokela ganogile kulawa kwa Mndewa Imulungu,
Uno awo ulelo wa iwanhu omkweleleza heyo,
Nani ayo Mndewa yeli na udahi wose?
Nani ayo Mndewa yeli na udahi wose?
